content.rendered:
About me

Ramona joined Regent College Wembley Campus in September 2015. Prior to Regent she was working for a different training provider, in the further education sector. While working for Regent she has also been studying towards qualifications. She is very passionate about her work and gets very satisfied when she sees students succeed. She speaks fluently in two languages – Romanian and English.

Key responsibilities

  • Being involved in the entire student journey from enrolment till graduation
  • Assisting students with all their queries (attendance, academic performance, student data)
  • Maintain student records and ensure that they up to date and accurate. Update University of Bolton when necessary
